lines.text: [first lines]
Honey, come on over here, sugarbuns. This machine just called me an asshole.
Curtis? Are you dead?
You can't! WE MADE YOU!
Jesus is coming and he is pissed!
Adios, motherfucker!
What do you think happened here?
Fucked if I know, Bubba. Fucked if I know.
Sodas, I'm buyin'!
[seeing the trucks circling around the truck stop]
Oh my God. "When we get to that truck stop, everything will be alright." Oh, yes...
[laughs softly, mockingly]
[Curtis shifts the car geer into drive]
What are you doin'?
You see that gap? The next time it comes around, I'm gonna shoot right through it.
No you don't! They'll gang up on us and squash us!
I can do it!
All so we can be inside where they are?
What do you think's gonna happen to us if we stay out here?

[pauses, then softly]
I'm scared.
Me too.
[seeing Hendershot's weapons stash]
Holy shit! You think he stole all this?
No, I think he bought it. That's what a guy like him does.
Buys things...?
Buy cheap and sell dear. It's the American way.
[watching the trucks circle the truck stop]
Mosta them god damn things got no right t'be runnin'! They s'posed to be depoted!
I don't give a ladybug!

[upon seeing a semi crash into his new car]
Cocksucker!

[flips off the Zeke's trash truck]
you scum ball you wanna rock & roll with me puss bag!
I ain't never seen a hero with his ass in the air like that.
If you don't get your hand off my leg, you're going to be wiping your ass with a hook next time you take a dump!
I never heard no talk like that when I was a boy.
You really going after Deke, man?
Yeah.
Look here, how many fingers you see, huh? Eight? Twelve?
Okay, so I got a little double vision, but it's clearin' up Bill. I gotta find my boy! I gotta! Anything could be goin' on out there! Chrissakes!
You leave here without punching out... and you ain't never gonna have to punch out again, Bubba.
Good! You leave me alone you fat fuck!

[grabs him]
Why you...
Don't! Leave him alone.
Or what?
Or I'll knock your teeth in... Bubba!
Maybe tomorrow it will be our world again.
I don't know. Was it ever?

It isn't the comet. It's a broom. Imagine you're a race of aliens, right? And, you're looking for a new place to live. Say you're looking for a planet like you and I looking for a new place to live. A new house. So here's Earth. Only it's like this big old house. And, it's kind of polluted, dirty, and smoky. Grease on the walls, soot in the chimney. So, they send in their interstellar housecleaners. Send in their broom. Sweep us all up. That's what this it is, it's a broom. Using our own machines to sweep us right off.

[hears order board and walks up to it slowly, raising the machine gun and sliding the bolt]
This is for my dad, you loudmouth son of a bitch.

[after shooting the board, unstraps the gun and hands it to Brett]
I don't want this anymore.
I'm scared.

[chasing after semi that crashed into his car]
I'm gonna tear 'em off, boy!
Eat my shorts!
What the hell are you doing in there?
Changing. That salesman had his hands all over me, and he's dead now and I don't like the smell of him on me. I don't like it.
Jesus!
Bill, where's my dad?

[casual tone]
Oh, your dad got scrubbed by one of 'em big boys out there earlier today. Tough break, kid.
You unbelievable shithead!

[oblivious]
What? What'd I do?
Yo mama!
Well, this damn thing.
What's the matter, honey?
Well, this thing was working just fine a few minutes ago, and now I can't get peaturkey on it.
You want to bring me a light coffee when you get done jerking on that thing, darling?

[radio goes static]
Shit!
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What's wrong there, sweet thing?
Pull in there! And if you don't get your hand off my leg you're gonna be wiping your ass with a hook the next time you take a dump.
I swear, I never heard no talk like that when I was a boy.
Fuckin' truck's supposed to be depoted! That was depot du jour!
Mother's helper?
A girl hitching her way down to Florida needs some protection.
Yeah? That's what you're doing?
Yeah. That I was doing before every machine went into maximum overdrive.
We gotta get some gas.
That's good, because I got to go to the ladies room.
Can I come in and watch?
No, you cannot come in and watch!
Damn.
